boardgame.name: Munchkin Adventure Time
boardgame.description: In Munchkin Adventure Time, players can help Finn, Jake, Lumpy Space Princess, and friends navigate the perils _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and the rewards! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; of the Land of Ooo. Will _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Oh my glob _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; look out!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; be the last thing Adventure Time fans hear from Princess Bubblegum? Or will Finn and Jake save the day with a sturdy sword and a hearty _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Slamacow!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Munchkin Adventure Time is both a standalone game and an expansion for other titles in the vast Munchkin family._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Munchkin is a satirical card game based on the clich_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;s and oddities of Dungeons and Dragons and other role-playing games. Each player starts at level 1 and the winner is the first player to reach level 10. Players can acquire familiar D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D style character classes during the game which determine to some extent the cards they can play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There are two types of cards - treasure and encounters. Each turn the current players _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;kicks down the door_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; by drawing an encounter card from the deck. Usually this will involve battling a monster. Monsters have their own levels and players must try and overcome it using the levels, weapons and powers they have acquired during the game or run away. Other players can chose to help the player or hinder by adding extra monsters to the encounter. Defeating a monster will usually result in drawing treasure cards and acquiring levels. Being defeated by a monster results in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;bad stuff_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; which usually involves losing levels and treasure._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Munchkin Adventure Time 2: It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a Dungeon Crawl!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: New in shrink Shipping based off of location of buyer. No additional fees, just the exact cost. Thanks
Bought this and played once, not for me. Would be open to trades for a similarly priced item, maybe Sushi Go or the Power Up expansion for King of Tokyo, for example.
